alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland; Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bay, northern Saginaw and Midland Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pleasant Valley, or 10 miles northeast of Alma, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midland, Bay City, Auburn, Pinconning, Coleman, Sanford, Freeland, Kawkawlin, Essexville, Edenville, Zilwaukee, Linwood, Oil City, Pleasant Valley, Munger, Carrollton, Hope, Crump, Indiantown and Bombay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
